page.title: 05POPULATION IN ASTON-J-M
page.content: The{population}is very stable with a large number of adults having always lived in the area,often in the same farm or cottage. Few families come from counties other than Cheshire.Of the families with{children}living at home the no. of offspring varies from 1 to 4,with 2 the most common. Adult {employment}includes farming (the major occupation) building contracting, teaching, driving and policework. A blacksmith also lives in and works from the area. There is some unemployment and also a number of women who choose to stay at home, either to look after young children, to run the home, or to work from home. There are also a few people who have retired from work and remain in the area.
